name: Welcome to the Arena
description:
The goal of this project was to create a game in less than two weeks, using already created assets.

Welcome to the Arena was developed in Unreal Engine 4 and is still under development. Don't hesitate to give feedback about it!

Future upgrades planned:

  • Finish up the class system
  • Improve class unlock system
  • Improve bosses system

Known bugs:

None for now. Some cheats may result in buggy behavior

Recruiting:

As you can plainly see and hear, Graphics and Sounds are not original. Therefore, I would appreciate the help of capable illustrators and musicians. Contact me if you are interested in helping. We might release this game to the public.
